articles.title: 2021 is already getting busy. Have you kept up or are you so last year? Test yourself with our news quiz and find out - ABC News
articles.description: Have you been on top of the news this week, or are you still in holiday mode? Test yourself and find out.
articles.content:
The new year is really starting to swing into action.
Have you been on top of the news this week, or are you still in holiday mode? 
Test yourself and find out.
